Events that occurred on 17 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1894 - Hilary Tolkien, J.R.R. Tolkien's brother, is born.
1919 - Hilary Tolkien returns home after the War.
1934 - Actor Barry Humphries is born.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 23.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97a.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes to Wordsworth.
1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Julie Cape.
1978 - Actor Rory Michael Kinnear is born.
1979 - Composer Bear McCreary is born.
1991 – The third day of the first "Colloquium on the Languages of Middle-earth" at the house of E.L.F. member Bill Welden.
1991 – Singer Ed Sheeran is born.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south down the Anduin.
Gwaihir bears Gandalf to Lothlórien.
